51000049.text: The History of the Edeta I

51000050.text: The History of the Edeta II

51000062.text: The Soul Bridge and the Barons

51000069.text: The first part of the topic of discussion

51000070.text: The sequel to the hot topic

51000071.text: The main character of the martial arts competition

51500002.text:
According to the data from many different sources regarding the Protectors, their job is to guard the Unknown Corridor that we discovered.
There is one intriguing hypothesis that I would like to make. The Protectors not only guard the Corridor, but also test the warriors who dare to enter it. I am quite confident about this hypothesis, as it is based on the Protectors' positions, coverage, and action patterns observed so far.

51500004.text:
The Sagewood mentioned by Nahee turned into a distorted beast and vanished. Rumor has it that it looks hideous, smothered in its own sap.
Believe it or not, I heard that one of the villagers acquired a piece of the dried sap and had a wish fulfilled.
Adventurers, do not be fooled by such rumors. If you do happen to come across this Sagewood on your travels, run away...

51500006.text:
The Peach Blossom... Doesn't that have a nice ring to it? They are the group you should go to when you want to buy or sell something!
They actually began as a group of armed escorts. But after taking care of a Sea Dragon, they've expanded and grown into the large merchant group we know today. They're so influential that when they buy a product, it causes a fluctuation in the market price of the item itself.
That's even more so now that Horyong holds the mantle of leadership. They now act as a pillar to the Saho and have contributed greatly to the annual Harvest Festival.

51500007.text:
A passionate and popular merchant group. That's how people describe the famous Plum Blossom Merchants.
Mehwa, the leader of the group, along with her reputation, are known far and wide. Honestly, some people even join the group just out of respect for her. Although the Fish Network Master is the official leader of Sapphire Basin, people say that's only possible thanks to Mehwa backing him...
Not only do the Plum Blossom Merchants help stabilize the region, but I heard that they even actively volunteered to help out with exploring Haewol. That's why you can occasionally run into them on the new continent.

51500009.text:
According to folklore, Steelfang is a real monster. After being ousted by the Lycandi tribe,
the Poachers used the offspring of beasts as living weapons to win the war. That's when Steelfang was born.
One day, however, one of the chains that the Lycandi used to imprison Steelfang broke, and it escaped. Did someone free Steelfang to take advantage of it, or did it rescue itself? No one knows for sure.
Rumor has it that it's hiding out in the Sapphire Basin, so be careful...

51500010.text:
There is a giant tree in the Sapphire Basin that's been there since time immemorial. Citizens refer to it as the Sagewood and would pray for good fortune upon it.
But recently, the Sagewood does not look to be in good health. It seems it is being negatively influenced by this Fissure, which suddenly appeared out of the sky. The villagers tried to dig up the Sagewood and move it to a safer place, but the Hollows that emerged from the Fissure rendered the Sagewood completely inaccessible.
Like the others, I am going to leave this place, as there is nothing left that we can do... I hope the Sagewood forgives us...

51500013.text:
Put your heart into the steel! There isn't a single soul in the Sapphire Basin who hasn't heard of Soul Steel. Without it, who would be able to craft the weapons and armor we so desperately need?
But even now, many wonder whether Soul Steel could have made it this far without the discovery of Haewol. After all, it's a known fact that they were able to monopolize the mining rights and expand their shipyard capabilities thanks to its discovery. It was during this time that Geum Horam, the head of Soul Steel, demonstrated his outstanding leadership.
The current head of Soul Steel, Moonwind, is from the Lycandi tribe and is also well known for his leadership skills, despite his young age.

51500015.text:
The Blackram East Fleet Chapter barely recovered its presence at the harbor as the dark chi gradually faded away. Not long after, pirates took over the harbor and it again could no longer function as a port. That is when the residents of Moonwater Plains started to assert the need to build a harbor at the southern coast of Sapphire Basin.
An official who owned a large part of the coastal land of Sapphire Basin saw a lucrative opportunity in this and bribed high officials to make it happen. That is how Moonwater Harbor was built. Sapphire Basin entered its heyday thanks to the immense civil engineering effort.

51500016.text:
A rumor started to spread that the new continent was full of gold, so the governors tried to convince the Emperor that they needed to go to the island to find out the truth. The Emperor ordered Chief Commander Sangyun to recruit a team of explorers.
Suh Junmoon, one of the generals who worked for Sangyun, volunteered to take on the job. He collected support funds by promising profit to investors, thereby successfully creating a team which the Emperor dubbed the "Sol Seekers."
This is the very place where the expedition team received their name from the Emperor.

51500017.text:
To the sailors, the Sea Dragon was an absolute being. Where the Sea Dragon resided was regarded as a no-man's-land. However, the Sea Dragon disappeared suddenly, and has not been sighted ever since.
With the Sea Dragon gone, people were able to venture further across the ocean. That was the beginning of the exploration of the unknown world.

51500019.text:
Based on the data collected so far, the Protectors seem to routinely perform only the orders they are given.
However, the Protectors found here do not seem to act according to any specific routine. They only seem to focus on attacking while staying relatively close to a place called the Unknown Corridor.
I shall dub these Protectors "the Enraged Protectors" and report my findings to the leader of the Elucidator Scholars. Adventurers must tread carefully...

51500024.text:
The Sol Seeker explorers led by Captain Suh Junmoon successfully discovered a new land. The newly discovered land had many names tossed around at first, but in the end it was dubbed 'Haewol Island,' which perfectly describes it as "the land across the sea."
As the exploration of the new land showed progress, the explorers realized that its size is not that of a mere island. They sent an inquiry to the government to request it be regarded as a continent. The governors started a debate on whether they should name another land a continent besides their main continent, Sabang. Finally, the Emperor ended the debate by using his authority to designate it as such. That is how the Haewol continent came to be.

51500026.text:
In fact, there was another group of Sol Seeker explorers in the past. People called them the 'Forgotten Explorers'.
The Forgotten Explorers went on a mission across the sea after the Sea Dragon was gone. Dojung, the leader, wanted to quit the mission after discovering nothing but a useless, barren land. Faced with extreme pressure, he hastily came up with the idea of hiring prisoners to work on that land. He set out with the prisoners in tow, but never made it back. There has been rampant speculation about what happened.
Many believe that there was a fight between the prisoners and soldiers, and that most of them ended up being killed.
This spot is where they poured out liquor in hopes that they would have a safe journey. Now, it is where people pay tribute to the dead.

51500027.text: The Sea Dragon's disappearance acted as an important step forward for Moonwater Harbor. Soon, it buzzed with people involved in deep-sea fishery and explorers who wanted to study the newly-accessible part of the sea. Also, as the Fish Network was in decline due to the Bottomless Pit incident, many influential figures moved their investment to Moonwater Harbor.

51500029.text:
There isn't a specific record that indicates when the Baron race came into contact with people. The Barons seemingly appeared out of the blue and acted as a bridge between the spiritual realm and the physical world.
They have become the very Soul Bridge that we see on a daily basis. They are now an integral part of adventurers' lives.
They can imbue their spiritual powers into weapons and create Soul Stones that enhance adventurers' abilities. They recently started providing a skill that allows the user to travel long distances using the power of the earth. This has become popular among adventurers, but be careful, as it can take a toll on weary users.

51500030.text:
What happened at the Bottomless Pit has transformed the Sapphire Basin entirely. Many villagers turned into Hollows, and the once-prosperous land is barely maintaining fragments of its very existence. With this message, I pay my respects to all the victims of that incident.
What appeared from the Bottomless Pit is assumed to be a Sura, whose existence is reported only through written word. The Fissure turned the villagers into Hollows, but other Hollows also emerged from it. Given this situation, we can assume that the Fissure is connected to another space.
Besides Hollows, Suras also create powerful beings known as Ecizer. Recent research has discovered that the Fissure and Ecizer are linked to each other. Ecizer also comes from the Fissure.
Many wanted to learn more about these transcendental beings, but none could find any useful information.

51500032.text:
People have started to become more wary of Hollows after the Bottomless Pit incident. And in the midst of all that, the powerful clan of Edeta found this.
This so-called Caelite is known to have an overwhelming effect on the Hollows. They say if you destroy the Caelite, the power from within it can seep into the Hollow's Fissure and close it, but I've never seen it first hand. Not to mention, Caelite is extremely rare, so you'll only see it put up as a reward in an extremely famous competition. I hope you get to see it in all its glory one day.

51500034.text:
I used to beg my parents to take me to the Harvest Festival in the Sapphire Basin to fly a wish lantern. In my youth, I thought that wish lanterns were just part of the ceremonial process, but I found out otherwise after I became a Elucidator Scholar. I even flew one during this year's festival while thinking about the people of old...
You must know who I'm talking about, since you're from the Fish Network. He was the prodigy that people assumed would take the mantle of leadership in the future. He was perfect; both diligent and skilled in his martial craft. He would help others out and acted as the leader of the village defense. People used to praise him as the next Fish Network Master.

51500035.text:
But then, everything happened in an instant.
We could feel something was off about that year's Harvest Festival. The ceremony preparations were well underway as people got ready to fly their wish lanterns.
But the papers that we were saving for the wish lanterns were lost in a fire. It was only later that we also realized through an urgent report that the people who left to get a supply of bamboo for the lanterns were killed by Hollows. Needing someone to take the blame, people turned their anger towards him. Naturally, he gave up his position and volunteered to leave the town.
In time, we found out that the guide was to blame, as he accidentally led the party towards the Bottomless Pit. However, this was only uncovered after he had long left.
Whatever the case may be...we've been flying wish lanterns every year since then.
People might have forgotten what happened, but I haven't. I fly my lantern to wish him well.

51500036.text:
In Caelite Land, there is an area that resembles the Sea Dragon. Looking at it from a distance, it looks like the Sea Dragon is lying across the ocean. There are many theories about this, but the most convincing one is that the land was formed following the death of the Sea Dragon. Of course, acknowledging the existence of the Sea Dragon is a precondition to this theory.
Explorations still take place around the Dragonhead Exploration Camp in pursuit of finding evidence to prove the existence of the Sea Dragon. The Plum Blossom Explorers are actively working on this. This fable shall continue as soon as more information is collected.

51500037.text:
If you've been to the Taero Forest, you must have heard about the place where the shipwreck debris remain. People have seen pirate ships or even haunted ships at night.
Upon further investigation by the Elucidator Scholars, those are just small ships used to smuggle goods. Haewol requires strict identity checks for any ships that enter the land through Dojung Port. So, some ships, in an attempt to avoid this, took a different route and washed ashore due to the current. The Sol Seekers tried to clean up the debris, which was unsightly and dangerous, but failed to even get started because of the Oduksinis residing on the beach. So now, people are hoping the debris will eventually be weathered by the wind.
In conclusion, there are no ghost ships! I hope this information is useful to you adventurers. Don't be fooled by false rumors.

51500038.text:
I have heard that many people used to faint upon entering the Tranquil Woods. The Simyu Valley right next to it has a clear view of the area's surroundings. On the other hand, the Tranquil Woods is full of rocks and tall trees, making it easy to get lost. Some adventurers were found unconscious after losing their sense of direction in the forest.
But now, this phenomenon does not happen anymore. At the beginning of the development, the Soul Bridge investigated this matter and discovered that there was a barrier with unknown energy. Furlong and his team successfully removed the barrier.
Now, everyone can enjoy the beautiful scenery of the Tranquil Woods. It is highly recommended for adventurers to visit there.

51500039.text:
The lingering beings are what we call Hollows.
The Elucidator Scholars have many opinions about when and how they came about. One undeniable truth is that Hollows appear with a Fissure. The inside of a Fissure is an undiscovered area. (Please inform the Elucidator Scholars if you have any information regarding this.)
Anyhow, Hollows are extremely hostile to people, so be careful if there is a Fissure nearby.

51500041.text:
Have you seen a monster called Oduksini?
You better not lose your mind when you see one. Everyone from Haewol knows the story about a Sol Seeker who lost a finger after answering Oduksini's riddle incorrectly.
Oduksinis used to simply be mischievous beings, but they turned hostile when their home was taken over by people. Oduksinis can't take all the blame, as this outcome should have been expected, but things started to get out of hand. Therefore, the Sol Seekers have been trying to eliminate them.
Stay focused and do not lose yourself when you encounter an Oduksini!

51500042.text:
When I first started to explore Haewol, what most caught my attention was the Greenhorns of the stag race. This is because their attitude turned out to be completely different from what was written in history books.
When the explorers arrived at the continent, the Greenhorns approached them with their King, Baphomet. Although the Greenhorns showed no animosity, the explorers, afraid of their large horns, trapped Baphomet. Being very nimble, Baphomet escaped the trap with a chain still latched onto him.
Ever since that incident, the Greenhorns started to shun people. Baphomet has never shown himself outside of the Greenhorn Woods. You would be wise not to approach them, as you will do nothing but enrage them.

51500043.text:
The Ape King Ogong, the king of the Simyu, is quite infamous. He used to live in the Moonwater Plains, but moved to Haewol after a series of incidents.
He still likes to fight and is always looking for someone strong to duel. It would not be such a bad idea to challenge him, if you think you have what it takes. He definitely won't go easy on you.
On the one hand, seeing as how neither people nor chimeras can stop time, the Ape King Ogong is probably getting weary, but still! He is the Ape King! I urge you courageous adventurers to take on that challenge!

51500044.text:
At the time of Haewol's development, the Shadowed Mistwood was the most dreadful place for explorers. Thick fog, poisonous herbs, polluted water, and even monsters caused many explorers to lose their lives. Giant Mantises are some of the most fearsome creatures there. Scholars have been studying them but haven't deduced why they've grown so big.
The Giant Mantises absorb water from the swamp and emit a hallucinatory fog that causes those affected to see images of familiar people. They attack people after causing them to lower their guard. No one should approach this area, especially alone. Many adventurers have tried to defeat the Large Mantises, but there is no way to stop the hallucinations as far as we know. Adventurers, tread carefully around that area.

51500045.text:
Have you heard of the Gray Jungle found in Caelite Land? The area used to be a thick forest at the start of its development. Soon after, explorers found a Giant Caelite, and there was an unfortunate accident while digging it out. Ever since, as told by the exploration records, the forest lost its original colors and vibrancy and turned the gray color it is now.
We know that the accident didn't affect only the area's surrounding environment, but also its inhabitants. For example, take the White Night Gargoyles living at the Hideout of Disaster.
Perhaps they were victims of the accident and ended up living in that dark place, left only with bitterness towards people. Some Sol Seekers have been killed by the White Night Gargoyles. So, don't visit the Gray Jungle out of mere curiosity. You have been warned.

51500046.text:
During the development period, the Sol Seekers were short of explorers. So, they recruited more explorers by making a pact with Hogcapo, the chieftain of the Hoglins, a part of the Haewol continent. The powerful Hoglins were a great help to the exploration, but the deal did not end peacefully. The Sol Seekers refused to give up the promised land because the development was not complete. The Hoglins, with their patience running thin, quit the job.
They now live near the Crimson Forest Path and are still holding protests against the Sol Seekers. Hogcapo's hatred toward the Sol Seekers may have extended to all people, so beware, adventurers.

51500048.text:
Most people must be familiar with the term "Heavenly Ritual." I first heard about this from a Baron when I began my research on the Saho.
The Heavenly Ritual, as the name implies, is a ritual for the heavenly gods, in other words, the Advocates. I've never witnessed the ritual myself, so I'm not sure if the Advocates show themselves during the ritual. What I know for sure is that the ritual requires three things: a bell that calls for the way, a mirror that shows the way, and a sword that makes the way. The ritual is only complete with these three things.
Seeing this ritual is one of my lifelong wishes. I wonder if that day will ever come...

51500049.text:
The Edeta was established by a warrior called Jangul from Solak. But he suddenly disappeared while he was expanding the Edeta with Un Kwani and Yu Deok, the two members of the Three Swordsmen of Solak. After that, the Edeta started to worship the Advocates, and it evolved into a religious group as generations have passed.
The group went through changes when Chobi became its leader. The Edeta left their base at Solak to move to the Cinderlands, which later became the base for the Edeta Movement.
Chobi emphasized the importance of martial arts skills and made the Edeta one of the most powerful organizations of warriors again. He also made peace with the elders and finally reunited the Edeta.

51500050.text:
After the successful Edeta Movement led by Chobi, the Edeta grew to become a mysterious group of warriors with religious affiliations. When the Edeta finally found stability, the Haewol exploration began. Chobi was unable to participate in the exploration due to health issues. He died shortly afterwards. Before his death, he appointed Harum as his successor. Harum was barely in her thirties then. That decision was shocking, but no one opposed Chobi's choice, as Harum had astonishing skills.
Harum, as the new leader, joined the exploration camp and boasted excellent victories. One of her greatest achievements was exploring the Dragonscale Desert. This helped the Edeta rise to even greater fame.

51500051.text:
True to her name, which means 'sunset's splendor,' Harum demonstrated exceptional talent in both learning and martial arts skills. Her sword skills in particular stunned many people.
With Chobi's confidence in her, she became the next leader of the Edeta at quite a young age. She continued to serve as a confident leader with a positive outlook. She also showed her quick determination by joining the new land exploration camp. After the tragic accident of the first exploration group, no one stepped up to join the second one, until Harum, that is. The successful exploration of the Dragonscale Desert was the brilliant outcome of her strong will.
Edeta has become the dream of many warriors, and Harum, praised by many, is the one who made Edeta the clan it is today.

51500052.text:
Recently, I have heard many people talk about the leader of Edeta, Harum. This probably has to do with the Martial Arts Championship that took place in the Sapphire Basin. The Martial Arts Championship is part of the Sapphire Basin's annual Harvest Festival, which Edeta goes to observe. Harum once prevented a giant Fissure from occurring at that very place.
She has not been seen ever since that incident. Many people are worried about her. There's a rumor circulating that she is stepping down from her position due to her worsening health. I visited the Edeta quarters to find out the truth, but with no luck. I hope to see Harum return soon.

51500054.text:
The Ivory Gale was established by Yangjung, a famed warrior known for his graceful martial arts skills. He organized a group of followers and established a base at Whirlwind Valley.
As per the age-old regulations, the throne of the clan leader is passed down through the family bloodline. When there is no living descendant, the next leader is elected by the elders. This is how Song Moonak of the Song family became the leader of the Ivory Gale. The Yang family had served as leaders for generations before that.
Song Moonak tried to change the clan’s stance by being cooperative with the empire and friendly to the public. He resolved the issues they had with the empire regarding autonomous rights over the Whirwind Valley. With such an achievement to his name, it did not shock anyone when the Ivory Gale was the first clan invited to join the Haewol exploration team.

51500055.text:
After joining the Haewol exploration team, the Ivory Gale had conflicts with the Tempest Empire. The Ivory Gale wanted to preserve the giant Caelite, whereas the Tempest Empire wanted to make use of it by digging it out. With neither party willing to back down, the Sol Seekers, sent by the Tempest Empire, tried to dig out the Caelite without the Ivory Gale's knowledge. But the site, for some unknown reason, was destroyed. Song Moonak later felt deeply betrayed, and the incident resulted in the current bad blood between the two factions.
As a result, Moonak began to have some doubts regarding the development process. This caused some disturbance amongst the young and talented members of the public. In the end, Moonak stepped down as leader and was replaced by one of those bright, young individuals.

51500056.text:
Not much is known about the new leader of the Ivory Gale, besides the fact that he is a young man of many talents and that he isn't Moonak's son, Song Sigook. This took many people by surprise. Any information on the new leader is normally shared with the public, but not this time.
Rumors started to spread that the leader cannot be exposed for some reason, or that the leader position has actually not even been filled at all. People also guess that Moonak was overthrown after his approval rating dropped. Who knows what the truth is?

51500057.text:
The most magnificent discovery of the Haewol development was the giant Caelite. Upon this unexpected discovery, the Tempest Empire started to increase its investment in the development process.
The discovery of the Caelite also triggered a deep conflict between the Sol Seekers and the Ivory Gale. Although official orders delayed any mining of the Caelite, the Sol Seekers were collecting pieces of it behind the Ivory Gale's back. Their actions were exposed through a mysterious incident. A Fissure appeared and destroyed the Caelite's surroundings. No one knows what exactly happened and why, but many believed that the Sol Seekers provoked the wrath of gods by taking the Caelite.
The area is now swarming with Hollows, making it impossible for anyone to approach it. To me, this is the tragic outcome of sheer greed.

51500058.text:
The Ivory Gale went through loads of trouble. The Shadowed Mistwood incident was no exception. It was a sheer nightmare for the explorers. The deep fog, poisonous herbs, and polluted water resulted in the spread of a disease that cost many explorers' lives. Sarouvi, one of the explorers, made a cure for the disease with some herbs. Thanks to her work, the explorers were able to carry on.
Unfortunately, those who died of the disease were all buried together, only being divided by which group they belonged to. The area where they are buried is called the Pioneers' Graveyard. You might still hear the mourning of the victims if you go there. It's such a heartbreaking story.

51500059.text:
Many people ask, "Which is more powerful, the Ivory Gale or the Edeta?" It is quite a popular topic of debate.
However, no one can possibly know the answer. The two clans have never competed against each other before. Also, Harum, the Edeta's leader, is well known, whereas the Ivory Gale's leader is still a mystery. This surely contributes to the public's rising curiosity.
In my opinion, the Ivory Gale joined the exploration earlier than the Edeta, so the Ivory Gale wins when it comes to who came first. But the second exploration was larger in size, so the Edeta wins in that regard!

51500061.text:
The Baron tribe is as old as time. To people, the Barons have always been good friends and supporters. Likely due to this relation is the reason they learned to speak the language of non-Baron people.
According to some historical texts, humans intruded on the land of the Barons while expanding their territory. The incident led to a division among the Baron tribe. After much deliberation, the Barons decided to move their homes and hide from people.
Soon after, the Fissures started to occur around the world with the Hollows, also affecting the Barons' habitats. From that point on, the Barons decided that they needed to collaborate with people.

51500062.text:
Barons are seen quite commonly in the company of people. These days, it is no longer surprising to see a Baron working as a high official or a leader of an important organization. The Soul Bridge, a group comprised only of Barons, maintains a good relationship with people.
The reason for these amicable ties could certainly be due to their friendly nature and cute appearance. But the most important aspect is their incredible ability. Barons are able to commune with souls, and they aid adventurers using that unique connection.
The Barons have earned their place as indispensable allies.

51500063.text:
You can always count on the Barons! Here's a little bit of trivia about them.
First, they have a mixed diet, but their favorite foods are silvervine fruits and Rainbow Balms. Rainbow Balms are beautiful plants with rainbow-colored leaves, but they smell quite the opposite of how they look. Barons are the only ones who can stomach that dried fish-like aroma.
They also have cute and memorable names. The name of the Soul Bridge chief is Furlong. It fits, doesn't it?
Say a friendly hello to a Baron when you see one during your journey!

51500064.text:
Have you ever heard of the Pioneer Barons?
Many adventurers are curious about them, so I have prepared some information! The group is composed of the leader Naypaw and members Poofur and Pahpaw. They are quite famous for their research on the connection between the ruins and the Protectors at the Sapphire Basin on the Sabang continent.
Many wonder what they will discover this time on the land of Haewol. Adventurers, give them a round of applause if you see them!

51500071.text: When it comes to the hot topic of Lake Vandal, this person cannot be left out. The newcomer who made it to the finals is the main character, and those who have attended martial arts competitions will recognize it immediately just by hearing his name. Of course, someone It is not clear exactly why Saho or Ereda forgave him after that, but it is not known exactly why he was the one who ruined the martial arts competition, but as a result of the investigation by Myung Hye-dan, he said that he was active here and there to clean up the ruined competition. It's a pity that I can't confirm the exact circumstances because I couldn't meet him. In any case, he is the protagonist of an unforgettable event in the history of martial arts competitions, and he is still a hot topic among people.

51500072.text:
Daeeobang invited Ereda to this festival and it became a hot topic. A lot of people's attention was paid to Harem, the owner of Ereda, but unexpectedly, there was a person who rose like a morning star among women. This is Oreum, a man who silently guards Munju everywhere. Many people have been curious about whether Oreum is her real name and Ereda's position on the martial arts event, and I have checked the answers to these questions.
"First, For me, my real name doesn't matter anymore. It has become more comfortable to think of it as just the Oreum of Ereda. Martial arts competition... An unexpected incident occurred, but I think that more damage was prevented thanks to Harem's quick response. It's just a pity that the festival that people expected has been ruined."

51500073.text:
The blue people are a very familiar name to adventurers. Especially to the people of Lake Vandal, the reputation of the people is even worse because of the Changdodan. It is said that they made a stronghold nearby. Many people are wondering why they came here, so Myung Hye-dan had a hard time investigating that part.
"What are you? Hey, pull it out! Wait, wait! what? Is this the famous famous biography or Danbi, or is it writing my name on the old house? big hum. Hey. release me! What are you cheeky asking? Why am I here? I, what's the reason Stonefist is in a corner like this? It's a treasure... a treasure! Hahahaha!"

51500074.text:
During your adventures, do you often use the forge to upgrade or repair equipment? When that happens, we look around the village to see where the Golden Gate Gate is. Besides Moonlight Wind, the current owner of the gate, Iron Fist is in charge of the forge. It turns out that the two have been close friends since childhood, and they played a key role in helping Geum Kyung-Chul-Mun grow up like this. I met one of them.
"Myung-Hye-Dan? heh heh Moonlight and the wind are good friends. We relied on each other during difficult times... My original dream was to be an adventurer, but I couldn't let Moonlight do this alone! Yes? Ah! What are you talking about?! Never, never, never, never misunderstand! Come on, stop it now!"

51500075.text:
Among the Saho, Yeonggyowon is the most popular among the people. This is because most of its members are Barongs. People around us who claim that Barongs have no cute parts from head to toe! Myunghyedan trainee checked this part to see if Barong himself is also realizing this popularity.
"Can't you see there's a lot of work to be done right now? Oh... clothes! no! Isn't this dog ragweed? It's grass! Wherever I see this, it's like weeding grass!! Okay...what's the question? popularity? Isn't the most popular painting show in the neighborhood next door? It's always crowded with people... It's like we don't find anyone..."

51500076.text:
Some adventurers get lost and wander about where they are. But no one will find their way worse than this one. Some adventurers have probably already met this person. It is a paradoxical theory called the Iron Warrior. I was able to meet the paradoxical theory that Myunghyedan was lost and lost in the green horn spring.
"You?! To show up in such an unfamiliar place! He must be a villain! This spear can pierce anything! Take it!"
"Wait a minute! I'm a trainee of Myunghyedan... Ahhh!!!! Save people!!!"

51500077.text:
How many people in the world can have the nickname of the best sword? But no matter who you ask, there is a person who is called the best sword. It is under the ranks of Pungbaekmun. At a younger age than I thought. As an elder, I have earned the envy of those around me, but I am playing the role of a member of Poongbaekmun. I was curious about the opinions of those around me, so I went to see them.
"I am just fulfilling my role according to my position. Besides, there are people around me who can't do my part... Phew. Oh no. Forget it now, haha! I'm just thankful for giving me the nickname "The First Sword" because I'm still lacking. We will not be conceited here, we will work harder!"

51500078.text:
Have you ever heard of adventurers being seawater hunters? They are people who make a living by selling their loot, targeting only the most terrifying sea creatures from all over the area. They are also skilled players, as they are not even able to deal with sea creatures with normal martial arts skills. . When standing in front of seawater, I checked how they overcame that fear.
"Do you have any questions for me? ha ha! Well, I'm quite famous... What's the most important thing in seawater hunting? That's the eye, the human eye! Does that person have any martial arts skills? Anyway, the eye is the most important thing, cancer!"

51500081.text:
해월대륙에 이주한 사람들에게는 수양이란 부대에 대해 들어보지 못한 사람이 없을 것이다. 수양, 이 뜻은 풍황제가 직접 하사한 이름으로 태양을 찾는다의 의미이다. 처음 시작은 신대륙 개척에서 출발하였으나 그 당시에는 큰 힘을 얻지 못했다. 별 기대 없이 시작된 원정대는 비옥을 실제로 발견하게 되면서부터 황제의 주목을 받게 되고, 막대한 지원을 받았다. 물론 그 과정에서 지금 수양을 이끄는 대장 서중문이 공로 대상에 포함되지 못했다는 풍문도 있지만, 정확한 사실 여부에 대해선 기밀 사항으로 파악할 수 없다. 
풍문이 어찌하였든, 지금도 해월대륙 개척에 누구보다 앞서 힘을 쏟고 있는 그들을 부디 응원해 주길 바란다.

51500082.text:
삼 형제 집안에서 가장 성공한 사람이라고 하면, 대다수 사람들이 이 사람을 생각할 것이다. 바로 해월대륙 개척의 일등 공신, 서중문 수양 대장이다. 어렸을 적에는 형에 치이고 동생에게 양보 당하는 둘째로, 부모님의 전폭적인 지원을 받진 못했지만 굉장한 노력으로 실력을 쌓았다고 한다. 그로 인해 제국군 입대 후 상장군 상연에게 능력을 인정받아 지금의 수양 부대를 이끄는 자리까지 올라왔다고 한다.
실제 부내 내에서의 서중문은 무섭지만, 절대 틀리지는 않는 사람이란 평을 받을 정도로 지휘 능력을 인정받고 있었다. 물론 과도하게 엄한 면이 있긴 하나 그렇기에 지금의 수양 성과를 이끌어 낸 것이 아닐까 생각된다.

51500083.text:
혹자는 그들을 광신도 집단이라 부르고, 혹자는 그들을 종교 단체라고 부르기도 합니다. 바로 검은새벽단입니다. 
이들이 세상에 알려진 지는 오래되지 않았습니다. 수양이 해월대륙을 개척한 이후 발생한 비옥 채굴 사건 즈음 창립된 걸로 알려져 있죠. 그들은 수라라고 불리는 존재를 믿으며, 수라의 뜻에 따라 부정한 자들을 모두 멸하면 새로운 세상이 도래할 것이라 믿고 있습니다. 대대적으로 자신들을 홍보하진 않지만, 이들의 교리를 믿고 따르는 자들이 암암리에 많은 걸로 알려져 있습니다. 물론, 비밀이 많은 단체여서 정확한 그들의 본거지나 창립지에 대해서도 역시 알려져 있지 않습니다.

51500084.text:
검은새벽단이 처음부터 세력이 컸던 건 아닙니다. 그러나 점차 부와 권력, 나아가 세상에 환멸을 느끼는 자들이 늘어날수록, 그들의 세력이 커진 건 사실입니다. 잃은 것들이 많은 자들과, 많을 자들은 검은새벽단의 교리에 응하기 시작했습니다. 
또한 검은새벽단은 단체 내에서 서로가 서로의 신분을 알아볼 수 없도록 철로 만든 가면과 검은 가죽옷을 입었습니다. 권력자와 하층민이 한 교단에 있어 분란의 요소가 생길 수 있음을 방지하는 하나의 요소였습니다. 이렇게 얼굴을 숨긴 단원들은 당당히 교단 생활을 할 수 있었고, 스스로 수라의 거룩한 사명을 행한다고 믿음을 가질 수 있었습니다.
그 결과, 지금은 풍백문과 에레다를 위협할 정도의 거대 세력으로 검은새벽단이 자리매김하게 된 것입니다.

51500085.text:
검은새벽단이 세력이 커지자, 이를 경계하는 여러 단체들이 생기기 시작했어요. 우선 정파에서는 당연히 그들을 반기지 않았죠. 그들의 교리는 허무맹랑하고 비현실적이며, 말도 안되는 거짓말로 사람들을 꼬드겨 자신들의 세력을 키우려 한다고 비판했어요
그 시점까지는 잠잠했던 풍제국조차 계속되는 검은새벽단의 기행에 더 이상 참지 못하고, 경계하기 시작했는데요. 특히나 에레다와 풍백문이 검은새벽단에게 지속적인 피해를 입자, 그들과 우호세력인 수양은 적극적으로 해월대륙에서 검은새벽단을 처단하기 시작했다고 해요!
모험가 여러분, 혹시나 모험 중에 그들을 만나면...조심하세요!

51500086.text:
해월대륙이 개척에 성공한 이후로 태록림, 비옥대지에 이어 현재는 용린사막까지 개척에 진출한 상태입니다. 최근 수양이 공식적으로 공표한 사실이 하나 있는데, 민간인들에게는 그동안 밝혀지지 않았지만 추가적으로 탐사를 진행 중인 지역이 있었다고 합니다. 바로 해룡산맥이란 지역입니다. 
물론 지금도 민간인들에게는 이 지역으로 이주나 진입이 허용되어 있지 않습니다. 아직은 개척을 완전히 마무리한 상태가 아니기도 하고, 더 큰 문제는 바로 검은새벽단의 주둔지가 있는 걸로 밝혀졌기 때문입니다. 해룡산맥을 알린 이유도 연속되는 실종 사건의 조사 과정에서 공표가 된 것인데, 여기에 민간인들뿐 아니라 풍백문과 같은 큰 문파도 엮여 있다고 합니다.
현재는 위험지역으로 선포되어 있는 만큼, 당분간은 해룡산맥에 혹시 잘못 발을 들이지 않도록 모험가들은 조심하시기 바랍니다.

51500087.text:
억울하게 죽은 영혼은 이승을 떠돌다 못해 원혼이 되어 버린다는 속설이 있죠. 하지만 이게 단순히 속설이 아니라고 합니다! 실제로 원혼들이 떠돌고 있는 곳으로, 자세히 들으면 그들의 소리까지 들을 수 있는 곳이 있다고 해요. 바로 영혼의 길이라 불리는 지역인데요. 이곳은 풍백문을 돕기 위해 해룡산맥에 진출한 영교원 바롱에 의해 발견되었어요. 바롱이 말하길, 이 지역 부근부터 강력한 영적 기운이 느껴졌고 그 기운을 쫓아오니 바로 여기 원혼이 가득 차 있는 곳인 영혼의 길이었다고 하네요.
제게는 그 기운이 느껴지진 않지만 다른 지역보다 유독 한기가 느껴지는 건...대체 뭘까요...?!

51500088.text:
해룡산맥에서 현재 가장 화두가 되는 건 바로 실종 사건이죠. 그동안 이 지역 주변으로 사람들이 사라지는 사건들이 종종 발생했었어요. 그때는 이 사건들이 공통점이 있을 거라는 생각을 못 했는데, 최근 풍백문까지 실종되는 사건이 벌어지면서 사건 수사가 급속하게 진행되었어요. 그 결과 이 사건들의 주범이 공통 집단이라는 게 밝혀졌죠. 바로 검은새벽단이 배후에 있다는 부분인데요. 이를 조사하기 위해 풍백문과 수양은 공조하기로 했고, 그 결과 해룡산맥 초입에 합동초소를 마련했다고 해요.
지금은 민간인의 출입이 금해져 있지만, 수양과 풍백문들의 생필품 제공을 위해 사호까지는 어느 정도 출입을 허용한 상태라고 해요. 물론, 저희 명혜단도 수사나 여러 기록 등을 위해 출입을 허가받았죠. 저희가 상세하게 기록해서 나중에라도 꼭 모험가분들이 참고하실 수 있도록 할 예정입니다!

51500089.text:
실종 사건에 대해 추가적으로 조사된 바에 따르면, 실종자들이 괴이한 모습으로 행방이 밝혀지고 있다고 해요. 그들은 같은 말을 계속적으로 반복하거나 난폭한 행동을 하는 등의 이상 행동을 보이고 있어서 수양과 풍백문이 사건 조사에 어려움을 겪고 있다고 합니다. 저희 명혜단이 한차례 실종자와 만남을 요청했지만, 수양 측에서 위험성이 있다고 판단해 이 요청은 받아들여지지 않았어요. 현재도 계속적인 조사가 이뤄지고 있긴 하지만, 해룡산맥이 지형적으로 안개가 끼는 등의 시야 확보가 어려워서 수색에 어려움을 겪고 있다고 하네요. 
혹시나 모험 도중 실종자로 보이는 사람을 목격한다면 꼭 수양에 제보해 주세요!

51500090.text:
본격적으로 풍제국에서 해룡산맥을 개척하기 이전부터, 수와족들은 이곳에 살고 있던 걸로 추측된다. 명혜단이 조사한 바로는, 그들이  곳으로 이주하게 된 건 예전 신대륙 개척을 위해 떠났던 잊혀진 원정대의 죄수 중 수와족이 있어서일 것으로 추측된다. 물론 이 주장에 대해 일부 사람들은 해룡산맥의 건너편에서 이주해 온 수와족이라 얘기하기도 하지만, 현재는 어느 쪽도 정확히 사실로 밝혀진 바는 없다.
해룡산맥으로 이주한 수와족 앞에, 검은새벽단이 나타나면서 그들의 비극은 시작됐다. 검은새벽단은 이 곳을 자신들의 본거지로 삼으려 했고, 그 과정에서 수와족을 대거 학살하기도 하였다. 수와족은 이에 대항했지만 힘의 차이는 너무나 극명했고, 결국 많은 수와족이 죽음에 이르렀다. 이때 살아남은 일부 수와족만이 지금의 수와족 무덤가를 지키고 있다. 
부디 안식에 잠들기를...무덤가 앞에서 기도한다.
